English: The 4th of July, the Embassy of the United States of America in Kinshasa received a letter from the Director of the National Intelligence Agency (DNI) John Hancock and the Director of the National Security Agency (NSA) Charles Thompson, in which they requested the assistance of the United States Government to assist the Government of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) in the investigation of the assassination of the former President of the DRC, Laurent Kabila.
